button.title: Button
button.description: Cross-platform button component for user interactions
quickTips: Use type='primary' for main actions, 'secondary' for alternatives
Add iconName for better visual hierarchy and UX

Always provide meaningful button text for accessibility

codeExample.title: Basic Usage
codeExample.code:

<Button
  type="primary"
  size="normal"
  onClick={handleClick}
  iconName="plus"
>

</Button>

codeExample.title: Confirmation Dialog
codeExample.code:
import { Modal, FlexColumn, FlexRow, Button, Text } from '@/components/primitives';

<Modal
  visible={showModal}
  title="Confirm Action"
  onClose={closeModal}
  size="small"
>
  <FlexColumn gap="md">
    <Text variant="strong">Confirm Action</Text>
    <Text>Are you sure you want to continue?</Text>
    <FlexRow gap="sm" justify="end">
      <Button type="secondary" onClick={closeModal}>Cancel</Button>
      <Button type="primary" onClick={confirm}>Confirm</Button>
    </FlexRow>
  </FlexColumn>
</Modal>

spacer.title: Spacer
spacer.description: Cross-platform spacing component for layout control
quickTips: Use for consistent spacing between elements
Works in both horizontal and vertical layouts
Size prop controls the amount of space
Better than manual margins for responsive design

codeExample.title: Layout Spacing
codeExample.code:
import { Spacer, Text, Button } from '@/components/primitives';

<FlexColumn>
  <Text>First section</Text>
  <Spacer size="lg" />
  <Text>Second section</Text>
  <Spacer size="md" />
  <Button type="primary">Action</Button>
</FlexColumn>

// SPACER-BORDER-SPACER pattern
<FlexColumn>
  <Text>Section 1</Text>
  <Spacer
    spaceBefore="md"
    spaceAfter="md"
    border={true}
    direction="vertical"
  />
  <Text>Section 2</Text>
</FlexColumn>
